GSSP Location: Coumiac Quarry, near Cessenon, Montagne Noire, France
Correlation Events: Conodont FADPalmatolepis triangularis, just above a major extinction horizon (Kellwasser Event) with conodont LADs Ancyrodella and Ozarkodina, and Goniatite LADs of Gephuroceratidae and Beloceratidae
